rename.description: Enter a new name for this workspace.

notes.selectWorkspace: Select a workspace to view notes

repos.noReposAddedHint: Add one or more repositories to this workspace from the options below

dialogs.chooseExistingRepo: Choose an existing repository from your file system

projects.createFirstPrompt: Create a project first to start working on tasks.

betaWorkspaces.title: Try the new UI
betaWorkspaces.intro: We've rebuilt Vibe Kanban's UI from the ground up, and you've been invited to try it.
betaWorkspaces.newUiDescription: The new UI is optimised for day-to-day work: juggling agents, previewing changes, and reviewing code. It also unlocks features that aren't available in the old UI:

newFeatures.multiRepo: Edit multiple repositories at the same time
newFeatures.multiAgent: Run multiple agent conversations (even across different agents) in a single workspace
newFeatures.commandBar: Faster navigation with the command bar

betaWorkspaces.oldUiDescription: For now, a few things still live in the current UI:

oldFeatures.kanban: Managing tasks on the kanban board

betaWorkspaces.transition: During the transition over the next few weeks, you'll move between both.
betaWorkspaces.optOutNote: Want to opt out? You can switch back to the current UI at any time in Settings.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.content: Welcome to Workspaces, a redesigned UI for Vibe Kanban. We're rolling this out to select users for early feedback. Share your thoughts anytime using the feedback icon in the navbar.

commandBar.title: Command Bar
commandBar.content: The command bar is your central hub for navigation. Open it with CMD+K to search and access every action available in a workspace.

contextBar.title: Context Bar
contextBar.content: The context bar lets you switch between panes quickly. Drag it wherever works best for you.

sidebar.title: Workspace Sidebar
sidebar.content: See the status of all your workspaces at a glance. Notifications highlight which ones need attention. Archive merged workspaces to keep your sidebar clean.

multiRepo.title: Multi-Repo Support
multiRepo.content: Add multiple repos to a single workspace. Reference code from one repo while working in another, or implement changes across several repos at once.

sessions.title: Multiple Sessions
sessions.content: Create multiple agent conversation sessions within a single workspace, including sessions with different agents. This helps you work around conversation limits or spin up review agents in separate threads.

preview.title: Preview Changes
preview.content: Preview your work in a built-in browser without switching contexts. Test across desktop, mobile, and custom viewport sizes.

diffs.title: Diffs and Comments
diffs.content: The redesigned diffs panel includes a file tree of your changes. Comment directly on diffs to give feedback to the agent, and view GitHub comments when your workspace is linked to a PR.

classicUi.title: Return to Classic UI
classicUi.content: Click the exit icon on the left side of the navbar to return to the classic kanban board. To disable the new UI entirely, update the "Enable Workspaces Beta" option under "Beta Features" in settings.

logs.selectProcessToView: Select a process to view logs

contextUsage.label: Context usage
contextUsage.emptyTooltip: Context usage appears after the next reply

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.sequentialHint: Sequential shortcuts: Press the first key, then the second within 500ms.
shortcuts.configurableHint: Configurable in Settings → General → Message Input

typeahead.noCommands: No commands available for this agent.
